content:
Book a minimum of 15 rooms for TWO nights AND let us reward you with FIVE ways to say thank you!

  1. One Complimentary Night Stay Per 30 Room Nights Booked
  2. One Premium Upgrade with Bottle of Wine for a Guest of your Choice
  3. $50.00 Gift Certificate to our Seven Stills Bar/Restaurant
  4. $75.00 Amazon Gift Card
  5. $15.00 Lyft Credits 

Book by 8/31 and actualize by 12/31. Offer not valid on existing contracts. Blackout dates may apply. 

Phone: 415.989.3500

E-mail: sales@stanfordcourt.com
